summary: Dramatisation of the true story of the sinking of the liner Laconia by a German U-boat in 1942 through the eyes of six survivors.
cast: Andrew Buchan|Ken Duken|Franka Potente|Thomas Kretschmann|Brian Cox|Lindsay Duncan|Matthias Koeberlin|Ludovico Fremont|Jacob Matschenz|Frederick Lau|Simon Verhoeven|Morven Christie|Jodi Balfour|Nicholas Burns|Ciarán McMenamin|Lenny Wood|Ben Crompton|Matthew Aubrey|Paul Hilton|Josef Du Plessis|Rebekah Nathan|Jörg Malchow|Oskar Brown|Stefan Rudolf|Nikolai Kinski|Christian Serritiello|David Butler|Louise Barnes|Hermanus Pieters|Richard Wright-Firth|Tom Fairfoot|Paul Savage|Lawrence Joffe|Marius Botha|Candice D'Arcy|Jannes Eiselen|James Gracie|Charlie Keegan|Danny Keogh|Darron Meyer|Nicholas Pauling|Grant Swanby|Ian Van Der Heyden|Michael Kirch
keywords: child in jeopardy|woman in jeopardy|polish officer|nazi u boat|ship officer

title: Laconia, el hundimiento
